name: AP_CLAIM_PX_BND_BUCKET
description: Holds the bundle related information for a procedure.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BND_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: Stores the bundle bucket IDs linked to the service.

columns.name: BND_BKT_AMT_ACCUM
columns.description: Holds the amount the service currently contributes towards the bundle bucket.

columns.name: BND_BKT_QTY_ACCUM
columns.description: Holds the quantity amount the service currently contributes towards the bundle bucket.

columns.name: BND_BKT_DTE_ACCUM_DATE
columns.description: Holds the service date that currently contributes towards the bundle bucket.

columns.name: BND_BKT_OVRIDE_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amounts of the bundle bucket overrides.
